title: Revenue of the BSH Group 2003 to 2018
summary: The chart at hand is a line chart where the x axis denotes Year and a y axis denotes Revenue in billion euros. In total the number of data points it has is 16.
Overall Revenue in billion euros has increased over the Year.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2014 and 2015.
The highest Revenue in billion euros, of value 13.8 was reached at Year 2017
Minimum Revenue in billion euros about 6.3 was reached at Year 2003
